game

Class PokerRules

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.PokerRules

  • public class PokerRules
extends java.lang.Object

    Class used for determine which player who has the best poker hand

      • determineHandRank

        public HandRank determineHandRank(Card[] fiveCards)
        Determines the highest possible rank of the five cards given as an input.
        Parameters:
        fiveCards - An array containing five cards.
        Returns:
        The highest ranking of the five cards in the array.

      • insertionSort

        private Card[] insertionSort(Card[] cards)
        Algorithm that sorts the rank of an arbitrary number of cards in ascending order.
        Parameters:
        cards - The unsorted cards.
        Returns:
        The cards sorted from the lowest to the highest rank.

      • getBestCardsSameRank

        public Card[] getBestCardsSameRank(Card[] hand1,
                                   Card[] hand2,
                                   HandRank rank)
        Method that compares two sets of cards with the same ranking and decides which one of the sets of cards is best.
        Parameters:
        hand1 - A set of five cards.
        hand2 - Another set of five cards.
        rank - The ranking the of hand1 and hand2
        Returns:
        The best set of the two sets of cards.

      • decideHighestCard

        public Card[] decideHighestCard(Card[] hand1,
                                Card[] hand2)
        Method that determines which one of two sets of cards that contains the highest card.
        Parameters:
        hand1 - Hand of five cards.
        hand2 - Hand of five cards.
        Returns:
        The hand that contains the highest card.

      • decideBestPair

        public Card[] decideBestPair(Card[] hand1,
                             Card[] hand2)
        Method that determines which one of two sets of cards that both have one pair, has the highest pair. If both sets of cards have the same pair, the set with the highest of the three remaining cards will be the best hand.
        Parameters:
        hand1 - Hand of five cards.
        hand2 - Hand of five cards.
        Returns:
        The hand that contains the highest pair.

      • decideBestTwoPair

        public Card[] decideBestTwoPair(Card[] hand1,
                                Card[] hand2)
        Method that decides which of two set of cards, both containing two pair, is the best hand. The set with the highest pair is considered to be the best hand. If the hands have the same two pair, then the fifth card kicker determines the best hand.
        Parameters:
        hand1 - Hand of five cards.
        hand2 - Hand of five cards.
        Returns:
        The hand that contains the highest two pair.

      • decideBestThreeOfAKind

        public Card[] decideBestThreeOfAKind(Card[] hand1,
                                     Card[] hand2)
        Method that decides which of two set of cards, both containing three of a kind, is the best hand. The set with the highest ranked cards that makes up three of a kind is considered to be the best hand. If two sets have the same three of a kind, then the highest of the two remaining card kickers determines the best hand.
        Parameters:
        hand1 - Hand of five cards.
        hand2 - Hand of five cards.
        Returns:
        The best hand that contains the three of a kind.

      • decideBestStraight

        public Card[] decideBestStraight(Card[] hand1,
                                 Card[] hand2)
        Method that decides which of two sets of cards, both containing a straight, is the best hand. The set with the highest ranked card is the best hand.
        Parameters:
        hand1 - Hand of five cards.
        hand2 - Hand of five cards.
        Returns:
        The hand that contains the highest straight.

      • checkStraight

        private boolean checkStraight(Card[] fiveCards)
        Method that checks if five cards make a straight. Also checking the special case with straight from ACE to FIVE.
        Parameters:
        fiveCards - The hand that may or may not make up a straight.
        Returns:
        A boolean that is true if the cards make a straight and is false otherwise.

        Parameters:
        fiveCards - The hand that may or may not make up a flush.
        Returns:
        A boolean that is true if the cards make a flush and is false otherwise.
